duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a variety of heavy equipment used in construction, maintenance, and excavation.
Follow company safety procedures and report any problems to the designated personnel.
Perform routine inspection and preventive maintenance on assigned equipment and report defects or needed repairs.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, ability to load trucks, cutting and filling grade, GPS, lime stabilization, and flex base.
Specialize in operating one or more of the following: Excavator, Dozer, Roller, Motor Grader.
Required to pass a drug test and criminal background check.
High school diploma or GED preferred.
